title: Luke Plapp Crushing the Learning Curve at Giro d’Italia: ‘I Think He Will Gain a Lot from This Tour’
content:
Jayco AlUla head DS Matt White says team is ‘playing the long game’ with Giro d'Italia 'best young rider' Plapp.

Read the full article at Luke Plapp Crushing the Learning Curve at Giro d’Italia: ‘I Think He Will Gain a Lot from This Tour’ on Velo.
